blogPost.excerpt: Transcribe your YouTube video in one click and highlight the important stuff for easy and quick reading. you-tldr let's you skim through the video transcript and skip to the good stuff. You can also download the transcript for your records.
blogPost.body: Transcribe your YouTube video in one click and highlight the important stuff for easy and quick reading. you-tldr let's you skim through the video transcript and skip to the good stuff. You can also download the transcript for your records.
blogPost.title: you-tldr - Get the tldr of any YouTube video in seconds
blogPost.author: Bilal Tahir

localize.description: 只需单击一下即可转录您的YouTube视频，并突出显示重要内容，以便轻松快速阅读。你-tldr让我们先浏览一下视频记录，然后跳到好的部分。您也可以下载文字记录作为您的记录。
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内获得任何YouTube视频的tldr

localize.description: 只需單擊一下即可轉錄您的YouTube視頻，並突出顯示重要內容，以便輕鬆快速閱讀。你-tldr讓我們先瀏覽一下視頻記錄，然後跳到好的部分。您也可以下載文字記錄作爲您的記錄。
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內獲得任何YouTube視頻的tldr

previous.excerpt: Learn Azure Fundamentals is an app which helps you to learn the basics of Microsoft Azure and Cloud Computing by answering questions in tests. App contains 14 unique tests, 269 questions, 132 articles. Learn offline. App is absolutely free. No Ads.
previous.title: Learn Azure Fundmentals - Learn Microsfot Azure fundamentals by passing tests

localize.description: 学习Azure基础知识是一款应用程序，它通过在测试中回答问题来帮助你学习Microsoft Azure和云计算的基础知识。APP包含14个独特的测试，269个问题，132篇文章。离线学习。APP是绝对免费的。没有广告。
localize.tagline: 通过测试学习Microsfot Azure基础知识

localize.description: 學習Azure基礎知識是一款應用程序，它通過在測試中回答問題來幫助你學習Microsoft Azure和雲計算的基礎知識。APP包含14個獨特的測試，269個問題，132篇文章。離線學習。APP是絕對免費的。沒有廣告。
localize.tagline: 通過測試學習Microsfot Azure基礎知識

next.excerpt: Textcraft is a magical utility for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that allows you to transform any text in real-time into a variety of 80+ different formats.
next.title: Textcraft - Magic text transformations

localize.description: Textcraft是一款适用于iPhone、iPad和Mac的神奇实用程序，允许您将任何文本实时转换为各种80多种不同的格式。
Textcraft是一款適用於iPhone、iPad和Mac的神奇實用程序，允許您將任何文本實時轉換爲各種80多種不同的格式。
